channel.title: wine on JonTheNerd
channel.description: Recent content in wine on JonTheNerd

item.title: Increasing the Wine font size
item.description: Thus far in using Ubuntu, I’ve been able to use only Linux applications. I’ll admit that some of them were just ports of their Windows or Mac OS X counterparts…but I never had to install wine (a compatibility layer for running Windows programs). Well you know that torrent app I recommended? kTorrent? It’s crashed on me several times in the last couple days…and ate up every bit of memory the system had this morning.
